column.name: LOGON_KEY
column.comment: logon_key is a unique value assigned to each service provider to allow service provider identification when logging into the Administrative application. It can be up to 8 characters and is assigned by the platform owner when creating a service provider.

column.name: DISABLED_FLAG
column.comment: Flag to determine whether this service provider is disabled.

column.name: ENABLE_MAX_SESSIONS
column.comment: Turns Max Session feature on/off for calling card application.

column.name: ENABLE_MAX_CALLS
column.comment: Turns Max Calls feature on/off for broadband application.

column.name: ALLOW_PHONE_NUMBER_MAINTENANCE
column.comment: Indicates that the service provider has permissions to add, delete and upload broadband phone numbers. Default value set to F.

column.name: ENABLE_MAX_SESS_FOR_PARENT
column.comment: Indicates if the parent service provider at the highest level has turned the max session feature on for calling card.

column.name: ENABLE_MAX_CALLS_FOR_PARENT
column.comment: Indicates if the parent service provider at the highest level has turned the max call feature on for broadband.

column.name: SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE
column.comment: unique code that identifies a service provider, used for callback features.

column.name: MAX_SIMULTANEOUS_CALLS
column.comment: Maximum simultaneous broadband calls a Service Provider has to give to child service providers.

column.name: MAX_SIMULTANEOUS_SESSIONS
column.comment: Maximum simultaneous calling card sessions a Service Provider can have.

column.name: AVAILABLE_SESSIONS
column.comment: Available Calling Card Sessions a Service Provider has to give to Child service providers.

column.name: AVAILABLE_CALLS
column.comment: Available Broadband Sessions a Service Provider has to give to Child service providers.

column.name: ECRC_NUMBER
column.comment: PSTN phone number to forward the call to if routing to PSAPs are unsuccessful.

column.name: FORWARDING_NBR_1
column.comment: First number to try to forward the call to.

column.name: FORWARDING_NBR_2
column.comment: Second number to try to forward the call to if the first is unsuccessful.

column.name: FORWARDING_NBR_3
column.comment: Third number to try to forward the call to if the first and second are unsuccessful.

column.name: PSAP_1
column.comment: IP address to redirect the call to.

column.name: PSAP_2
column.comment: Backup IP address to redirect the call to.

column.name: PRIMARY_SOFTSWITCH_IP
column.comment: ip of primary softswitch used for all outgoing calls.

column.name: BACKUP_SOFTSWITCH_IP
column.comment: ip of primary softswitch used for all outgoing calls.

column.name: PROXY_SERVER
column.comment: The proxy server that subscribers connect their ATA device to for broadband.

column.name: CREDIT_LIMIT_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether credit limits should be applied to this service provider.

column.name: CREDIT_WARNING_METHOD
column.comment: Indicates the method of determining whether the credit is close to being used up. 0 - use a percentage threshold, 1 - use a fixed amount.

column.name: CREDIT_LIMIT
column.comment: Max currency amount the service provider is allowed to use.

column.name: CREDIT_USED
column.comment: The amount of credit the service provider has used.

column.name: CREDIT_WARNING_THRESHOLD_PCT
column.comment: The percent of the credit used before warning the service provider.

column.name: CREDIT_WARNING_THRESHOLD_AMT
column.comment: The fixed amount of the credit used before warning the service provider.

column.name: PIN_GEN_LIMIT_FLAG
column.comment: Flag to determine if the feature to limit the number of pins a service provider can generate is on.

column.name: PIN_GEN_LIMIT
column.comment: Number of pins this service provider is allowed to generate.

column.name: PIN_GEN_AVAILABLE
column.comment: Remaining number of pins this service provider is allowed to generate.

column.name: PIN_GEN_SELF_NOTIFICATION
column.comment: A threshold when reached triggers an email notification. Percentage of pin_generation_limit.

column.name: PIN_GEN_PARENT_NOTIFICATION
column.comment: A threshold when reached triggers an email notification to the parent service provider. Percentage of the pin_generation_limit.

column.name: SERVICE_PROVIDER_ID
column.comment: Object ID for Service Provider

column.name: SERVICE_PROVIDER_ID
column.comment: Service Provider OID
